00179 inline void PreprocessorStatistics::updateTotalTime ()
00180 {
00181     totalTime_ = 0.0;
00182 
00183     if ( globalThresholdingTime_ != 0 )
00184         totalTime_ += *globalThresholdingTime_;
00185 
00186     if ( templateFilteringTime_ != 0 )
00187         totalTime_ += *templateFilteringTime_;
00188 
00189     if ( averagingFilteringTime_ != 0 )
00190         totalTime_ += *averagingFilteringTime_;
00191 
00192     if ( thinningTime_ != 0 )
00193         totalTime_ += *thinningTime_;
00194 
00195     if ( regionsExtractionTime_ != 0 )
00196         totalTime_ += *regionsExtractionTime_;
00197 
00198     if ( slantingCorrectionTime_ != 0 )
00199         totalTime_ += *slantingCorrectionTime_;
00200 
00201     if ( spacesLocationFindingTime_ != 0 )
00202         totalTime_ += *spacesLocationFindingTime_;
00203 };
